de.mrapp.android.dialog.model

Interface ScrollableDialogDecorator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dialog
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ScrollableDialog
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScrollableDialog, MaterialDialog, ScrollableDialogDecorator

    public interface ScrollableDialogDecorator
extends Dialog
    Defines the interface, a decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and may contain a scrollable content, must implement.
    Since:
    3.6.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface de.mrapp.android.dialog.model.Dialog

        Dialog.Gravity

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface de.mrapp.android.dialog.model.Dialog

        MATCH_PARENT, WRAP_CONTENT

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean areDividersShownOnScroll()
      Returns, whether dividers, which are located above and below the dialog's content, are shown, when the content is scrolled, or not.
      void showDividersOnScroll(boolean show)
      Sets, whether dividers, which are located above and below the dialog's content, should be shown, when the content is scrolled, or not.

      • Methods inherited from interface de.mrapp.android.dialog.model.Dialog

        getContext

    • Method Detail

      • areDividersShownOnScroll

        boolean areDividersShownOnScroll()
        Returns, whether dividers, which are located above and below the dialog's content, are shown, when the content is scrolled, or not.
        Returns:
        True, if the dividers, which are located above and below the dialog's content, are shown, when the content is scrolled, false otherwise

      • showDividersOnScroll

        void showDividersOnScroll(boolean show)
        Sets, whether dividers, which are located above and below the dialog's content, should be shown, when the content is scrolled, or not.
        Parameters:
        show - True, if the dividers, which are located above and below the dialog's content, should be shown, when the content is scrolled, false otherwise
